channel.title: Pur3zscape, great coding over 900 source dl's, base delta SERVER AND CLIENT
channel.description:
your starter is 25m, full iron and iron scimitar and iron gloves and boots.
home: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/1.png[/img]
shops:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/2.png[/img]
assault:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/3.png[/img]
pestcontrol:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/4.png[/img]
fully working pray and added piety and chivalry [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/5.png[/img]
fishing area:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/6.png[/img]
pking places:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/7.png[/img]
fightpits:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/8.png[/img]
minigames:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/9.png[/img]
monster teles and also traning place:: [IMG]http://i731.photobucket.com/albums/ww318/Megascape/10.png[/img]
custom items:: wings || if u get these wing s u can do ::wings or ::God to fly. santa armour need to buy from member-shop
features:: fully working skill jad minigame fully all skills are full working god wars fully working kq (need full veracs to kill) fully working pc kbd ( need anti sheild) lunar sprits vengance
weapons: fully working dds spec g maul full spec all gs spec and more
hard monsters monsters:: green drags mith drags kbd gargoyle elf warriors
and more that i can remember
commands:: ::home this server is based on delta scape source and upgraded to be fun..
will upgrade soon pics and more, there are kbd and stuff.
some info: NOTE: This is not a client download. This is the source download.
Recuirments: Knownledge of hosting private servers WinRAR Java (JDK) And some other things to get the server online, and running
Some questions: Q:Are you quitting Pur3zscape? A:No. Q:Can you teach me how to portforward? A:No, Do it yourself Q:Can you host for me? A:No, Im hosting Pur3zscape ~~~~ Credits: 60% Delta - For the amazing source - 40% Me - For editing what i've edited. -
source dl: source download downloaded 430+ times so far!
client dl: http://www.mediafire.com/?e3pcjko9z2q Source dl: http://uppit.com/69CBLX
